LINE_LENGTH: 79

**********
def func1():
    """
    Example
    -----
    >>> a = 2
    >>> b = 3
    """
    pass

def func2():
    """
    Examples
    ----
    >>> a = 2
    >>> b = 3
    """
    pass






def func3():
    """
    Examplesss
    ----
    >>> a = 2
    >>> b = 3
    """
    pass

class MyClass:
    """
    This is my class

    Parameters
    ----------
    arg1 : int
        Arg 1

    Examples
    -------------
    Should not be wrapped, because of `>>> ` and `... `
    >>> result = my_function(
    ...     arg1=1,
    ...     arg2=2,
    ...     arg3=3,
    ... )
    """
    pass

**********

def func1():
    """
    Examples
    --------
    >>> a = 2
    >>> b = 3
    """
    pass

def func2():
    """
    Examples
    --------
    >>> a = 2
    >>> b = 3
    """
    pass






def func3():
    """
    Examplesss
    ----
    >>> a = 2 >>> b = 3
    """
    pass

class MyClass:
    """
    This is my class

    Parameters
    ----------
    arg1 : int
        Arg 1

    Examples
    --------
    Should not be wrapped, because of ``>>> `` and ``... ``
    >>> result = my_function(
    ...     arg1=1,
    ...     arg2=2,
    ...     arg3=3,
    ... )
    """
    pass
